title: Hand Crossbow +1
content:
Hand Crossbow +1 Information

Hand Crossbow +1 Location & Where to Find

This item can be randomly purchased from blacksmiths and merchants accross the game. Confirmed merchants: Dammon (Emerald Grove) Roah Moonglow (Goblin Camp, Moonrise Towers) Derryth Bonecloak in the Myconid Colony (Underdark)

Dammon (Emerald Grove) Roah Moonglow (Goblin Camp, Moonrise Towers) Derryth Bonecloak in the Myconid Colony (Underdark)
